sentence.Network_en: The under age drinker's parents will be notified of the mulct.
sentence.Network_cn: 那些未成年饮酒者的父母将会被告知来支付罚金。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(M) ... mulch 护盖物 mulct 罚金 mule deer 长耳鹿.
以 -ct 结尾的英语单词 -... ... evict 驱逐, 逐出, 收回 mulct 罚金, 处以罚金, 抢夺 sacrosanct 极神圣的, 至圣的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent.: from Latin mulctare, multare, from mulcta 'a fine'

sentences.sentence: "He swindled me out of my inheritance"
"She defrauded the customers who trusted her"
"the cashier gypped me when he gave me too little change"

auth_sentence.content: Nor was this the only mulct which Providence exacted.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nor was this the only mulct which Providence exacted.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nor was this the only mulct which Providence exacted.

auth_sentence.content: Imposed a heavy mulct on every one of his servants.
auth_sentence.res_content: Imposed a heavy mulct on every one of his servants.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Imposed a heavy mulct on every one of his servants.

auth_sentence.content: The Revenue might mulct him with largish fines.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Revenue might mulct him with largish fines.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Revenue might mulct him with largish fines.
